title: The art posters
body: So for like the past year iv always wanted the jinx vs vi poster but it was always out of stock along with 90% of the stuff on the store. Now recently every poster but four are just gone from the store?? is that permanent?? I just want one dame poster riot.

replies.body: It always sucks when items go out of stock, I've been needing that Tibbers onesie in my life something bad. Nowadays we have a little stock tracker in the upper right hand corner of the item, but since that specific poster isn't even on the site anymore I'm not sure if it will be available again =/ .
so the item is gone for a year and then removed and i never get it......thanks riot :3
